original_text: They have turned against the Lord. Their children do not belong to him. They enjoy the new moon feast. But that will soon destroy them and the crops in their fields.’
korean_text: 그들이 여호와께 정조를 지키지 아니하고 사생아를 낳았으니 그러므로 새 달이 그들과 그 기업을 함께 삼키리로다

sentences.original_text: They have turned against the Lord.
Their children do not belong to him.
They enjoy the new moon feast.
But that will soon destroy them
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그것은 곧 그들을 멸망시킬 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: and the crops in their fields.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 밭에 있는 곡식들도 멸망시킬 것입니다.
